dct_title_s: Sketch map of the Bustar Dependency by Captn. T. Holdich R.E.
dct_description_sm: Territory of Bastar Dependency [princely state] shown in yellow. Relief shown by hachures. Includes inset map [scale ca. 1:18,330,000] showing position of Bastar Dependency in East India. From: Proceedings of the Royal Geographical Society and monthly record of geography. Vol. 1 (1879), no. 6, pp. 372-82; held in Firestone Library. Call number: G7 .J6873
